author: Special Correspondent
text:
The HCL Talent Care (Private) Limited signed a Memorandum of Understanding with Mahendra Engineering College, Mallasamudram near here on Wednesday. According to the MoU, the HCL will facilitate the college to use the logo of HCL during their promotional campaign; organise free technical sessions and lecturers on latest technologies; conduct Interview preparatory session for all the final year students; participate in the college tech events; provide business books to the college library; conduct JQ assessment for all the final year and pre-final year students.

The Mahendra Engineering College will be listed as an authorised test centre on HCL website and also will be named as a preferred partner or a HCL partnered institute.
title: MoU signed with HCL Talent Care
